kef.kysr m<d;ano uydêlrKh - ;%sl=Kdu,h
merKs kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu

oekaùfï Èk isg f;uila .; jQ miq tkï 2015'04'30 jeks Èkg miqj úkdY lrkq ,nk nj fuhska okajd isákq ,efí'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2015'02'06 147
.eiÜ m;%h m< lsÍu ms<sn|j jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
i;sm;d uqøKh jk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h idudkHfhka  isl=rdod Èkj, m<  lrkq ,efí'
isl=rdod Èkhla rcfha ksjdvq Èkhla jQ  úg tu isl=rdod  Èkg m%:u jev lrk Èkfha .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'  ta wkqj .eiÜ m;%fha
m< lsÍu i|yd  ksfõok Ndr.kakd wka;su  Èkh o tu i;sfha we;sjk  ksjdvq Èk .Kk wkqj fjkia  jkq  we;'
ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'
my; i|yka  kshñ;  fõ,djg  miq ,efnk  ish¨u ±kaùï th tjQ wh fj; ;emEf,ka  wdmiq tjkq ,efí'  B<Õ .eiÜ m;%fha  th
m< l< hq;= kï wjYH ixfYdaOkhka lr wdmiq  túh hq;=h' rcfha  uqøKd,h fj; ;eme,a  u.ska tjk ±kaùï  wm%udoj tys ,eîug
iEfyk fõ,djla §  ;eme,a lsÍfuka  jqjukd  
.eiÜ m;%hg ±kaùu we;=<;a  fjkjd fuka u th ish¨ fokdf.a u myiqjg o fya;= jk
nj i<lkak'
Y%S ,xld  m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h ñ, § .ekSu i|yd ish¨u odhl uqo,a rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s  fj;
fl<ska u f.úh hq;=h'
ie<lsh hq;=hs' - uqo,a  f.jd .eiÜ m;%fha  m< lrkq ,nk ±kaùï i|yd whúh hq;= uqo,a  rcfha  uqøKd,hdêm;s  fj; túh
hq;= nj i<lkak'
Wmf,aLkh
udih m< lsÍfï Èkh .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd  ±kaùï
Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh yd fõ,dj
2015
fmnrjdß 2015'02'06 isl=rdod 2015'01'23 isl=rdod oyj,a 1 2'00
2015'02'13 isl=rdod 2015'01'30 isl=rdod oyj,a 1 2'00
2015'02'20 isl=rdod 2015'02'06 isl=rdod oyj,a 1 2'00
2015'02'27 isl=rdod 2015'02'13 isl=rdod oyj,a 1 2'00
ud¾;= 2015'03'06 isl=rdod 2015'02'20 isl=rdod oyj,a 1 2'00
